item.description:
Hi all,
A delectable confection, Ernst Lubitsch's hilarious screwball comedy of jewel thieves in love stands the test of time as one of the most entertaining films of the 30s.
Here is a complete review: http://www.apolloguid...

Trouble in Paradise is being screened as a double feature with "Silk Stockings" a 1957 musical adaptation of Lubitsch's "Ninotchka", starring Fred Astaire and Cyd Charisse which also features a comedic turn by Peter Lorre in a song and dance number (this alone might be worth the price of admission). Screens at 5:30.

While "Silk Stockings" may be a minor effort, "Trouble in Paradise" looks like a lesser known classic from the director of the original "Heaven Can Wait".

At the conclusion of "Trouble in Paradise" Tom will be holding a Meetup sign near the front row and then its off to a local restaurant to discuss.
item.name: Trouble in Paradise- A Screwball Comedy from the 1930's
